ai-atk-s0402a35:1_0: He then enjoyed himself with something released from his voice.
ai-atk-s0402a35:1_1: desire for the five kinds of sensual stimulation.
ai-atk-s0402a35:1_3: Empty of emptiness, and they gave wholehearted qualities to talk.
ai-atk-s0402a35:1_4: Someone who sees clearly contemplates ... doesn’t get enough motivated, and fails to get.
ai-atk-s0402a35:1_6: soon this there’s only a misfortune.
ai-atk-s0402a35:2_0: The successive permutation series is finished.
ai-atk-s0402a35:3_0: The Visākha are running errands and messages for the Nuns
ai-atk-s0402a35:4_0: The Book of the Threes is finished.
ai-atk-s0402a35:5_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
